headquarters: New York, New York, United States
name: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc.
summary: Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. is a global professional services firm. It operates through four main segments: Marsh, which provides insurance broking and risk management; Guy Carpenter, a specialist in reinsurance broking and advisory services; Mercer, which provides talent, health, retirement, and investment consulting; and Oliver Wyman, a global management consulting firm. The company provides advice and solutions to clients in areas of risk, strategy, and people.
